code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import Footer from'./Footer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Noticias=()=>{const[noticias,setNoticias]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchNoticias=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('/data.json');if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response was not ok');}const data=await response.json();setNoticias(data);}catch(error){setError(error.message);}};fetchNoticias();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Noticias"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error al cargar las noticias: ",error]}),noticias.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:noticias.map((noticia,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:noticia.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:noticia.description})]},index))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No hay noticias disponibles."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});};export default Noticias;
